model

Class Project

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Project

  • public class Project
extends java.lang.Object
    The Project class represents a project entity in the system. It contains information essential for managing evidences within the system.

        Constructor for the Project class.
        Parameters:
        nameProject - The project's name.
        description - The project's description.
        pilar - The pillar to which the project belongs.
        initialDate - The start date of the project.
        finalDate - The end date of the project.
        status - The status of the project (active or inactive).

      • countRelevantEvidences

        private int countRelevantEvidences()
        Counts the number of relevant evidences associated with the project. Relevant evidences are either reviews or standard evidence items.
        Returns:
        The count of relevant evidences associated with the project.
